name: Q*bird
description:
This is a simple arcade clone(?) for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam.

I have only played Q*bert for like 3 minutes, but my spouse suggested it when I said I needed a short, isometric game to learn Godot with, and they draw birds, so here we are!

Use the arrow keys to move.

Check out the pixel artist, Shalmons!

SFX from a pack by W.O.W Sound.
